attributes.action: Make God Save The Queen by The Sex Pistols our new national anthem
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lets get rid of our outdated, dreary, national anthem honouring our out-of-touch, unelected, head of state and adopt the sex pistols' 'god save the queen', a REAL portrayal of our monarchy and the state of britain today.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
